Name: La Falote
Review Text: Absolutely delighted to have found this gem on my last day in Amsterdam. The Chef/Owner (I assume) and the waitresses were so lovely and nice! Checking in on me but not overbearing so I didn't feel rushed at all (As a solo traveler, I tend ‚Ä¶

Name: La Falote
Review Text: What sells this place are the people. Came round to have some proper Dutch food, and they mixed a couple of dishes for me to get a good overview of seadonal Dutch dishes. ‚Ä¶

Name: La Falote
Review Text: what a wonderful recommendation by everyone, thank you Google map. This is the best food I have in amsterdam. super authentic Dutch food.  a rare gem. ‚Ä¶

Name: La Falote
Review Text: Best service ever! The chef came personally to take our orders after introducing the menu of the day. We even had the chance to hear him play a song or two for us. Moving on, we had the green pea soup which he recommended. Not a fan of ‚Ä¶

Name: La Falote
Review Text:
very very delicious soup and main menu. very kindness serving staff.

Name: La Falote
Review Text: A lovely little restaurant in a quiet neighborhood. Food is of big portion, good quality and affordable price. Waitresses are very nice.

Name: La Falote
Review Text: Quite a nice cozy place. Got a warm welcome. Food was simple and delicious. If you really want a taste of the Dutch cuisine, this is the place to go.

Name: La Falote
Review Text:
Such an amazing place.
Thank you for I experienced Dutch food and a wonderful energy. I will come back for the lyrics book!:)

Name: La Falote
Review Text: Delicious, well-priced food in a cozy and casual atmosphere with kind staff. I cannot emphasize enough that everything we tried here was so, so good! Definitely recommend the herring and goose pate off the specials list of available, and ‚Ä¶

Name: La Falote
Review Text: La Falote is a classic Dutch restaurant with relaxed retro vibes. I had traditional Dutch green pea soup and beef stew, which were cooked to perfection! If you‚Äôre looking to taste high quality Dutch cuisine for a reasonable price, this is ‚Ä¶

Name: La Falote
Review Text: We ate at La Falote twice during our holiday in Amsterdam. The food was superb, and the service was excellent. The staff made you feel like you were just popping over to Grandma's house for a visit. Super friendly! When the head chef came ‚Ä¶

Name: La Falote
Review Text: Unbelievably lovely spot. I felt happy to dine there alone but I'd happily take a date there too. Lovely atmosphere, charming and helpful staff and the foods all homemade and scrumptious. Generous portions and cheap for Amsterdam.  I totally recommend it. X

Name: La Falote
Review Text: The friendliest most wonderful waitress and staff. She let me ride her bike to the ATM to get cash since it was a cash only restaurant. My first time riding a bike in Amsterdam!! Also the food was absolutely incredible - beef was incredible tender and the bangers and mash were delicious. Also the soup rocked!

Name: La Falote
Review Text: The probably nicest stay in a restaurant I had in my entire life. The service is outstandingly nice and super helpful. Food was amazing, I really recommend the pea soup! In the end the chef even played a song and sang on the Terrasse just ‚Ä¶

Name: La Falote
Review Text: I should preface this review by saying that I'm vegetarian, and this restaurant probably isn't the best place for vegetarians - there's plenty of other excellent veggie restaurants all over Amsterdam. But at the request of my friend to ‚Ä¶

Name: La Falote
Review Text: Staff could not have been more friendly and welcoming! We felt like we had been invited into someone's home for dinner. The food (schnitzel for me and stamppot for my mom) was so tasty. Before we left, my toddler was treated to an accordion performance. Such kindness from everyone, and the yummiest food! Definitely would recommend!

Name: La Falote
Review Text: La Falote serves solid Dutch cooking with a good choice of menu including such items as stew, meatball, sausage, liver, but also a bit more upscale dishes such as steak and fish. All with several vegetables and cooked and fried potatoes. ‚Ä¶

Name: La Falote
Review Text: I really enjoy the food and the service... The chef was super nice and very cheerful...

Name: La Falote
Review Text: Delicious "old fashioned" Dutch food, something like eating at your grandmother's home  (if she is a good cook). Great homely feeling. Relaxed place for a dinner on your own, or with your partner. We ate there before a concert and enjoyed ‚Ä¶

Name: La Falote
Review Text: The food is great and the atmosphere is really nice. If you want authentic dutch food that's the place to go. The day I went I had the pleasure of seeing how they celebrate birthdays at La Falote. Amazing experience! The service is also very good.

Name: La Falote
Review Text: Authentic Dutch food with Southern influences. Hidden gem with a lot of regulars. Recommended. Peter is an amazing guy! Bring cash! Not all Michelin food has to be very edgy. Strong all arounf stuff. The pudding with almonds and lavendel was great to finish the lunch off.

Name: La Falote
Review Text: Various reviews rave about this place, which is why we went, but for the life of me I can‚Äôt understand why. It was a huge disappointment, and possibly one of the most mediocre meals I have ever had. The service was excellent, and the ‚Ä¶

Name: La Falote
Review Text: We had the worst service at this restaurant. the waitress brought us bottled water when we asked for a glass of water and it cost 7 euros! Which of course she didn't tell us either. The menu said that the minimum order had to include an ‚Ä¶

Name: La Falote
Review Text: Seeing that La Falote was recommended in the tour guide I had, my wife and I decided to dine there for traditional Dutch food. It met every expectation in that regard. The stamppot was amazing and a little tip is to order the stewed pears. ‚Ä¶

Name: La Falote
Review Text: Is alright. Nothing much to cheer about. Somehow the arrangement of the food lead me to some thinking..

Name: La Falote
Review Text: The best Dutch restaurant ever. The owner is very nice and a gentleman. He gave us great suggestions and prepared our food by himself.

Name: La Falote
Review Text: The food was alright, priced at around 20 euros per person for a single dish and a beer. The music and ambience was subpar and the service was a bit slow. Be aware that they might not accept your card, you will only find out after your dinner and you're asked to walk 10 minutes to an atm.

Name: La Falote
Review Text: Overall bad experience due to the waitress, the food was tasty but maybe too light VS our expectations. The waitress suggested 2 traditional dishes and when we ordered she told us that they were not available anymore... We didn't had any ‚Ä¶

Name: La Falote
Review Text: Very similar to traditional swedish cooking with gravy, potatoes and mest as well as some raw fish dishes. If you are hungry and want to try some dutch cuisine I would recommend this place.

Name: La Falote
Review Text: I have no words to express how good I‚Äôm feeling in that spot! everything is just perfect! Best staff ever! Big portions with a fair price. A must go on Amsterdam for all ages

Name: La Falote
Review Text: Nice local food. Brilliant service, the waitress was so nice to us as visitors of the city (much like everyone we met in Amsterdam).

Name: La Falote
Review Text: I love this place! It‚Äôs been forever sense we have had service like this, The chef came out to talk to us about the food and she was super polite and educated about the meals and I can say that was the best service and food ever!

Name: La Falote
Review Text: Very nice little restaurant offering Netherlands cuisine. Food was good and the service as well. Moderate prices for Amsterdam.

Name: La Falote
Review Text: The food was delicious, the service was fantastic, and the atmosphere was wonderful. We spent 5 nights in Amsterdam and ate here 3 of them.

Name: La Falote
Review Text: Ordered salmon, which was undercooked, unsalted and with all the spines which made the dinner a very unpleasant situation. Care if you don't have debit card  because credit is not accepted (bring cash in that case).

Name: La Falote
Review Text: Worst experience! They place was empty, still it took them 10 min to bring us the menu, in addition they told us that no matter what we will order, they will charge us for main course, my wife wanted only soup, and it was unacceptable so we left without ordering.

Name: La Falote
Review Text: Absolutely world class service. So friendly, funny, warm and engaging staff. Food was brilliant as well and the price is pretty good. I highly recommend

Name: La Falote
Review Text: Perfect dinner! Delicious food! Super kind service. The best restaurant in Amsterdam!

Name: La Falote
Review Text: Very delicious fish, very niece chief. Hello from Russia, I was glad to be at this place, think it was best of our food restourant in Amsterdam

Name: La Falote
Review Text: Friendly and quiet with authentic Dutch food, but no bitterballen.  The food was good but not great.

Name: La Falote
Review Text: Amazing pea soup, stampott, and schnitzel! Cozy space with great hospitality. Wonderful experience :)

Name: La Falote
Review Text: Awesome food and service! If you ever want a true Dutch delicious food and experience, this is the place to go.

Name: La Falote
Review Text: The food was great, the host was better. Awesome place to eat dutch food in Amsterdam.

Name: La Falote
Review Text: Amazing restaurant, I would highly recommend to stop here! Great service with incredible, traditional Dutch food!

Name: La Falote
Review Text: Nice place with a lot of character. Friendly staff and quality "home made " food . Highly recommended.
